summary: A simple great sword model, untextured and free for use.
descriptionHtml:
I made this sword awhile back with the intent of making a texture and going through the lengthy process an amateur modeler such as me must take to make a weapon for Skyrim.

Well, long story short, it didn\'t work out.

So here\'s the original model, converted into an OBJ format, for anyone with enough time and interest to texture and put into Skyrim. It\'s free to use, just be sure to credit me as the original author and link me to the file if you ever upload it, P:

----------

EDIT - Added a 3DS-format file, for those who were having trouble with the OBJ format.
EDIT 2 - A DDS and NIF file have been provided for the sword by Sader325. It can now be textured, for those who wish to partake of the task.

----------

It was originally made in Sketchup, so I had some difficulty converting it properly through Blender; if there\'s any issues, please inform me, though chances are I can\'t do anything about it (Blender hurts my Sketchup-dependent brain).
author: Turinu

files.name: Unknown Great Sword - DDS and NIF
